As much as Vlad wanted answers, he was too proud to be ordered around 
by robots, as much of a warrior as they can be. He was a blooded Khan 
after all, not some filthy freebirth.

His internal sensors warned him of the coming of another group. There 
was something up here...

Vlad: BY THE BLOOD OF KERENSKY! STOP IT ALL OF YOU! YOU SHOULD BE 
ASHAMED TO FIGHT LIKE THOSE INNER SPHERE SURATS!

Shadow Star was coming around, seeing the Rogues from afar. He had 
strayed behind and let Talon go ahead. Now, he saw something 
interesting.

Shadow Star: Hmm... This warrior... He seems... a foreigner. It is 
obvious he is not of transformer origins. (He saw the bot that had 
come from the Pod) He seems to have made contact with the pod before 
us... but what a strange beast mode she has. (He opened a commlink to 
Spike and Talon:) Finish off this downed one. I am assuming command 
here. We keep those two bots, whoever they are. You are free to 
destroy those incoming bogeys, but I want those two others alive.
